StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetScreeningQues.onsAndAnswers]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @LeadID uniqueiden..er )
AS SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
Select sr.ScreeningResponseId, sq.SortOrder, sq.ScreeningQues.onID,sq.[Text] Ques.onText, sq.GroupScreeningQues.onID, sr.Answer, sr.Explana.on
from dbo.ScreeningQues.on sq
le. outer join dbo.ScreeningResponse sr on sq.ScreeningQues.onID = sr.ScreeningQues.onID and sr.ScreeningInfoID in (Select si.ScreeningInfoID from dbo.ScreeningInfo si where si.LeadID = @LeadID)
where sq.IsAc.ve = 1 order by sq.SortOrder
